objects.text:
• Self-sharpening steel blades
• 30 minutes cordless use
• DuraPower technology
• USB rechargeable

product_details.name: Philips Battery Powered SkinProtect Beard Trimmer for Men - Lasts 4x Longer, DuraPower Technology, Cordless Rechargeable with USB Charging, Charging Indicator, Travel Lock, No Oil Needed BT1232/18
product_details.description:
- 1.
- Get a skin friendly trim with the help of SkinProtect Comb.
- It gives you a comfortable clean look while providing extra skin protection.
- The comb guides the skin away from the blades for a close, smooth trim. 2.
- Get a perfect but protective trim with self-sharpening steel blades.
- Stainless Steel Blades for long-lasting sharpness as you get on day 1 of purchase. 3.
- Skin friendly rounded tips for smooth skin contact to prevent scratches and irritation, the blades have rounded tips for smoother skin contact to protect against nicks and cuts. 4.
- Up to 30 minutes of cordless ensures 3 weeks of usage* in a single charge of 8 hours.
- Comes with a USB charging cable for flexible charge.(*Basis 5mins of usage for 1 trim and 2 trims per week) 5.
- DuraPower technology to reduce friction on the blades, preserve the motor and keep a longer-lasting battery life going 4 times longer.
- Comes with a Charging Indicator. 6.
- Choose beard lengths of 3-7mm or the zero trim look 7.
- Build to last with 2-year product warranty, Maintenance-free and No oil required 8.
- Easy to hold and use.
- Designed to help you trim those hard-to-reach areas. 9.
- The trimmer is easy to maintain and clean.
- Detach the head and rinse it under the tap for easy cleaning then dry it and put it back.

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a modern, grid-based layout divided into four quadrants, each with distinct purposes. The top-left quadrant has a deep navy (#1A3A5F) background with a fine white text block using IDs `heading`, `subheading`, and `tagline` to present the brand and product name. The tagline text is highlighted in a bright cyan shade, creating a sleek tech-friendly appeal. 

The top-right quadrant showcases product visuals (ID `product_image`) arranged on a mid-navy background (#2C4D72) with a low-opacity grid. The bottom-left block in teal (#008495) presents key product features using the `description` text ID and minimalistic iconography. The bottom-right section features the product price (`price` ID) on a soft grey (#E0E0E0) background with a circular graphics overlay and a clear call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) in navy and white, respectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A3A5F
- Mid Navy: #2C4D72
- Teal: #008495
- Cyan: #00E0FF
- Light Grey: #E0E0E0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a modern electric trimmer with a sleek and masculine color palette dominated by deep navy blue (#1C2C43) and matte black (#1A1A1A), which lend a sophisticated and bold feel. The handle features textured black grip detailing blending smoothly into the navy body, providing contrast and style. Accessories are mostly black and charcoal gray (#2B2B2B), with a teal attachment (#125A66) adding a pop of contrasting color. The illuminated green LED indicator (#A4F53D) provides a vibrant focal point, suggesting power and activity. Together, these colors form a clean, tech-savvy aesthetic perfect for a modern, dynamic advertising banner.
